original_text: And the king said unto Haman, The silver is given to thee, the people also, to do with them as it seemeth good to thee.
korean_text: 이르되 그 은을 네게 주고 그 백성도 그리하노니 너의 소견에 좋을 대로 행하라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And the king said unto Haman
The silver is given to thee
to do with them as it seemeth good to thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 좋게 보이는 대로 그들에게 행하라
